nl_question: Which tissues express the gene TTN?
What are the approved symbols and synonyms for the gene MSH2?
cypher_translation:
MATCH (g:Gene {displayName: 'MSH2'})
RETURN g.approvedSymbol AS ApprovedSymbol, g.synonyms AS Synonyms

nl_question: What are the pathways associated with proteins encoded by the gene CFTR?
Which tissues express the BRCA2 gene?
Provide the gene type and description for the APC gene.
cypher_translation:
MATCH (g:Gene {displayName: 'APC'})
RETURN g.geneType AS GeneType, g.description AS Description

nl_question: What proteins are encoded by the BRCA1 gene?
What are the GO annotations for proteins encoded by the TSC2 gene?
Find other genes that are expressed in the same tissues as the MSH6 gene.
What disorders are associated with the gene BRCA1?
What is the gene type and chromosome location for the gene TP53?
cypher_translation:
MATCH (g:Gene {displayName: 'TP53'})
RETURN g.geneType AS GeneType, g.chromosome AS ChromosomeLocation

nl_question: Which proteins are encoded by the EGFR gene?
In which tissues is the CFTR gene expressed?
Can you provide the description and any known synonyms for the gene MSH2?
cypher_translation:
MATCH (g:Gene {displayName: 'MSH2'})
RETURN g.description AS Description, g.synonyms AS Synonyms

nl_question: What is the chromosome and gene type for the gene 'TTN'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (g:Gene {displayName: 'TTN'}) RETURN g.chromosome AS Chromosome, g.geneType AS GeneType

nl_question: Which disorders are associated with the gene 'BRCA1'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Disorder)<-[r:GeneAssociatedWithDisorder]-(g:Gene {displayName: 'BRCA1'}) WHERE r.scoreOpenTargets IS NULL OR r.scoreOpenTargets > 0.3 RETURN d.displayName AS DisorderName

nl_question: Which proteins are encoded by the gene 'EGFR'?
In which tissues is the gene 'TP53' expressed?
Can you provide the description and any associated disorders for the gene 'MSH2'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (g:Gene {displayName: 'MSH2'}) OPTIONAL MATCH (d:Disorder)<-[r:GeneAssociatedWithDisorder]-(g) WHERE r.scoreOpenTargets IS NULL OR r.scoreOpenTargets > 0.3 RETURN g.description AS Description, collect(d.displayName) AS AssociatedDisorders
